text:
My life's purpose is to
fundamentally give more

than I take, but also
to travel the world.

To build relationships
with very different people,

and eventually start
a family of my own,

and make sure that my
kids know that they can
be whatever they want to be.

My life's purpose is
to help build a world

in which hard work, creativity,
and collaboration trump

forces of division such as
race, sexual orientation, gender

And lastly, my life's purpose
is to empower others, and help

them realize that they are more
powerful than they believe.
